name: a BLADE in bullet hell
description:
Well, I guess you're now confined to your sword as a method of attack, amirite?

Battle through waves of endless bosses while unlocking weapons and upgrading your stats. You can dodge and reflect enemy bullets to keep yourself from trouble.

Thank you VGComposer for the music.

v1.0: base game released.

v1.1: mainly music and sfx, along with some balance changes.

v1.2: Options in pause menu, bullets getting short immunity, double upgrades, and even more!
